author: Nick Nairn
method: Place the creamed coconut, rice and hot water into a medium saucepan. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer gently for 10-12 minutes, or until the rice is tender, stirring occasionally and adding any extra water if necessary. Remove from the heat and transfer to a large bowl or serving plate to serve.  Garnish with coriander.
